channel.title: Logbird - Gateway for logs.
channel.description: Recent content on Logbird - Gateway for logs.

item.title: Configuring Rules
item.description: Logbird allows you to create flexible log queries, which supports picking values (from words and JSONs) found in log lines. To find the correct log line, the query can start with an asterisk (*) to find the correct line position, check examples. If it doesn’t start with the asterisk, the log line must start exactly like the query starts. So if query starts with payment then the log line must start with payment.
